name: Tap Tap Fruits Lite
description:
Tapping the screen to smash as many fruits as you can. Avoid the bombs or it's game over. Gear up for this exciting and addictive game.

-Very cute juicy graphics
-Survival mode
-Time mode
-High quality sound effects
-Game Center leaderboards
-Fruits will be thrown from four sides with different speed
-Stress relief
-Improve your reflex speed
